refnamediv.refpurpose: returns a formatted string or null if any of the arguments except the first is null.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: sprintf_or_null is similar to sprintf and returns a new string formed by "printing" a variable number of arguments arg_1 - arg_x according to the format string format. The difference is that the function can return null if any of the arguments except the first one is null.
